hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: USERS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The total number of users for the benchmark

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RAMP
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The amount of time in SECONDS for the Rampup of the total number of users

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DURATION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The duration of the benchmark in MINUTES
